review: a good for nothing bollywood hungama reviews this movie as 2 out of 5. this itself shows how critics in india suck big time ! this is dibakar banerjees best flick till date. it is so simple yet so excellent. story screenplay direction songs background scores all excellent. 4.5 out of 5 since charis character could have been a better choice nonetheless he did an okay job

13 years since it's release and it is still one of my favourite bollywood movie. there is something about it; it may be a brilliant cast ensemble, a funny script, a unique concept, significant character developments or all of them! it's uniqueness is quite evident from it's name itself. if you haven't seen this movie yet and you are a foreigner or a 10 year old, that's acceptable but if you are none of these two, you gotta watch it! it a bloody perfect movie!

amazing and fantastic movie . it's true that now a days people want to become rich in any how.  in these movie they have given message that middel class families fell jealous that rich people wearing expensive clothes , buying expensive gadgets , riding in expensive cars, throwing parties in a five star hotels, or buying expensive jeweleries which middel class people can't effort because they are salaried persons. they always think about that . that's why they can't leave in peace. competition always make them stress. nice movie.

very well scripted movie. the movie will make you aware about how a common man actually gets bullied by the mafia industrialist and property broker for his own piece of land how his whole family took their land back from them. 
a great movie you'll be definitely enjoying this. well acted and well directed movie.
